```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#R uses factors to handle categorical variables, variables that have a fixed and known set of possible values
x <- factor(c("BS", "MS", "PhD", "MS"))
x
```

```{r}
typeof(x)
class(x)
glimpse(x)
as.integer(x)
```
#Dates
```{r}
y <- as.Date("2020-01-01")
y
typeof(y)
class(y)
as.integer(y)
as.integer(y) / 365 # roughly 50 yrs
```
#Data Frames
```{r}
df <- data.frame(x = 1:2, y = 3:4)
df
typeof(df)
class(df)
```
#List
```{r}
l <- list(
  x = 1:4,
  y = c("hi", "hello", "jello"),
  z = c(TRUE, FALSE)
)
l
```

```{r}
df
```

# Working with Factors
```{r}
cat_lovers<- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ellaprotz/tidyverse/main/cat-lovers.csv')
names(cat_lovers)
glimpse(cat_lovers)
```

```{r}
ggplot(cat_lovers, mapping = aes(x = handedness)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
#Use forcats to manipulate factors
cat_lovers %>%
  mutate(handedness = fct_infreq(handedness)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = handedness)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
hotels <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ellaprotz/tidyverse/main/hotels.csv')
hotels
```

```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(starts_with("arrival_"))
```

```{r}
#Step 1
library(glue)
hotels %>%
  mutate(
    arrival_date = glue("{arrival_date_year} {arrival_date_month} {arrival_date_day_of_month}")
    ) %>% 
  relocate(arrival_date)
```

```{r}
#Step 2
hotels %>%
  mutate(arrival_date = glue("{arrival_date_year} {arrival_date_month} {arrival_date_day_of_month}")) %>%
  count(arrival_date)
```

```{r}
#Step 3
hotels %>%
  mutate(arrival_date = glue("{arrival_date_year} {arrival_date_month} {arrival_date_day_of_month}")) %>%
  count(arrival_date) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = arrival_date, y = n, group = 1)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
#Step 1 Revised
library(lubridate)
hotels %>%
  mutate(
    arrival_date = (glue("{arrival_date_year} {arrival_date_month} {arrival_date_day_of_month}"))
    ) %>% 
  relocate(arrival_date)
```
